Title: Asterix and the Vikings
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Romance
Writer: René Goscinny (comic book), Albert Uderzo (comic book), Jean-Luc Goossens (script and dialogue), Stefan Fjeldmark (collaboration), Philip LaZebnik (additional dialogue)
Actors: Roger Carel, Lorànt Deutsch, Sara Forestier, Jacques Frantz
Plot: The vikings come to Gaul and kidnap the chief's nephew. The chief sends Asterix and Obelix up north to get him back but the nephew has fallen in love with the viking chief's daughter v.v. What to do?
Country: France, Denmark, USA, Brazil, Germany, Spain, China, Estonia, Latvia, UK, Thailand
